Posts.Content: MaryLLL wrote: At my 6 month follow up, the radiologist said she wasn't 100% certain that what she now sees on u/s matches the pathology from my original core biopsy (same radiologist who did the biopsy).It was benign but I don't remember the terminology. Wasn't cystic or fibroadenoma, I do know that. I thought pathology was pretty definitive...does anyone have any experience with repeat core biopsies? Thanks! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Second biopsy on same lump? MaryLLL marie5890

Posts.Content: Feb 20, 2016 08:48PM MaryLLL wrote: Update: got results tonight. It is PASH and needs to be removed. Not sure what was different between 1st and 2nd biopsy.
